text: U.K based Journalist, author & broadcaster. Covering: Current & international affairs, history, sport (horse-racing & football), books, films, television, and plenty of other topics too.... Biographer of Edgar Wallace: http://www.thehistorypress.co.uk/index.php/biography-books/stranger-than-fiction-25294.html. Latest book Champion Jump Horse Racing Jockeys 1945 to Present Day- now out in paperback https://www.amazon.co.uk/Champion-Jump-Horse-Racing-Jockeys/dp/1399016725/
